text: Anata ga nanigoto ni juji shite ite mo, mata kuruan no dono bubun o dokuju shite ite mo, mata anata gataga don'na okonai o shite iyoutomo, anata gataga sore ni uchi konde iru kagiri, ware wa kanarazu anata gata no tame no rissho-shadearu. Tenchi no mijin no omo-sa mo, anata no nushi kara manukare rarenai. Mata sore yori mo chisai monode mo, oki monode mo (subete) hakkiri to shomotsu no naka ni (shirusa rete) nai mono wa nai nodearu
